website_summaries.verdict: Spacious drop-in tub for fans of larger bathtubs.
pros: A big bathtub that is easy to enter thanks to the drop-in access
cons: It doesn't have as many extra features as other bathtubs

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this tub!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant buying a tub online. Best purchase!! Its like a miniature individual pool! I absolutely LOVE this tub!! I'm 5'5 & and stretch out. Love the arm rests It's truly a soaking tub!! 23 minutes of filling it with water and it was only 2/3 full!! So glad we went with this tub!
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, huge soaker tub!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bathtub!! We are a big and tall family so I was looking for the biggest soaker I could get for the money. My husband stands at 6’4” and can almost stretch out completely. I can’t touch at 5’8”. Huge tub. Don’t forget the to order the drain that is extra. It’s a must.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: Large soak tub = happiness
customer_reviews.text: Just what I ordered. Came on a pallet with no damage, even helped me get it to the garage. Tub is beautiful and can’t wait to finish tile so we can have our first soak. I upgraded old 50 gallon water heater to a tankless system as I was concerned about enough hot water. Old water heater was 24 years old so it was a good excuse to replace. Installed new tub with no problems! Very Happy with this tub so far, will love it even more when I can soak the stress away!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tub.
customer_reviews.text: Great deep bathtub. Very comfortable shape for neck and back. The special overflow allows very deep water level. Nice finish that is easy to clean and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Big Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Searched around for the right bath. I wanted a stand alone but didn’t know if they would be comfortable or not. Thankful for the reviews on this one. It’s large. It’s deep. It’s wide. It’s comfortable. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Golfer Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great tub with minor issue
customer_reviews.text: BIG! Easy install according to my plumber. He couldn't say enough about it. He usually goes with a Canadian brand that costs twice as much. He was impressed with the quality and price. One gripe, the sold separately decorative front piece is junk. There are blocks molded into the tub that are crooked and didn't allow for the front piece to be installed correctly. Save some time and just tile it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Neal

customer_reviews.title: Large and well built.
customer_reviews.text: After moving into a new house, I missed my old hot tub. I'm passed drinking a bear and watching TV in a hot tub, so this is a great substitute. It has a water capacity of some small spas, but it's large enough for the water to stay warm for the amount of time I want to sit in it. I live in an area where water is cheap, so I don't mind the amount of water it takes for one use. It is well supported on the bottom and was no problem to install.
customer_reviews.author: Dr C.

customer_reviews.title: Luxury to soak in
customer_reviews.text: We love this tub! It was just what we were looking for in a deep bathtub. It is a beautiful tub and very comfortable to soak in. The size is the perfect size for a soaking tub where it feels like luxury to have the extra room, but it's not excessively big either.
customer_reviews.author: OlyNomad

customer_reviews.title: Bathtub was damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Bathtub was damaged from inside of the box. And instead of exchanging I have only retun/ refund option. It took me 2 weeks to get this bathtub and now it will take me another 2 weeks to return and get my money back. Then wait on another bathtub. Also the price went up, and my bathroom is ready for this bathtub, so I have to get the same one no matter what. I am very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the tub for a customer and he said he has been really happy. The only thing is this tub required it’s own special drain which there was a limited information about it. Little upset that I had to wait additional couple days to get the drain kit.
customer_reviews.author: Peter R.

customer_reviews.title: Great tub!  Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great tub. The largest we were able to find at an affordable price. We are using ours in an alcove and plan to add a shower to it. It is incredibly deep and roomy for the price. Also, the Fiberglas is lightweight which makes for easy installation. We highly recommend setting the tub in mortar once ready to put it in place (there are good videos of similar installations on YouTube). We are very happy with the purchase. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: FJP III

customer_reviews.title: Had a Crack
customer_reviews.text: There was a hairline crack in the top edge once we took the blue tape off and it was too late to send back. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: sharon mcfarlane

customer_reviews.title: Great bathtub
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bathtub. Great size and looks and functions beautifully in the bathroom. The product delivery was also handled very professionally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great installed. Must buy the deep overflow for this tub.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: oh so nice. Very thin lip around so make sure you ...
customer_reviews.text: Was praying this would arrive on time and not dented. SUCCESS!!!! waiting on the plumber to install will take new photos of room once done! 30 yr update on our bath, the other soaker was wider, for two. THIS IS NARROW for one and smaller foot print in our suite. BUT RICH LOOKING.. oh so nice. Very thin lip around so make sure you have wood tile areas for your trinkets!
customer_reviews.author: NEW 2 Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: A good looking tub
customer_reviews.text: The truth. A good looking tub, it's wide and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lima Mike

customer_reviews.title: great soaking tub large, comfortable with arm rest only issue was I use a regular rubber stopper instead of the stopper or plug
customer_reviews.text: Cant stop soaking and I dont want to leave this soaking tub, best buy for my remodeled upstair bath
customer_reviews.author: marilynmou

customer_reviews.title: The finish is good. The engineering is good
customer_reviews.text: Ive bought two of these and the first one is installed. The finish is good. The engineering is good. It feels stable when installed. There was a time when bathtubs had to be cast iron. Not any more. These work and look great and are a great value. The item came off the truck without a scratch. The only reason for deducting one star is the drain plug. assembly. It doesn't work without considerable effort. As ugly as they are, I am considering using a rubber stopper instead to avoid the hassle..
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Had to return, Amazon service is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I know we're only supposed to comment on the product - my apologies - but it's a pretty mean feat to order the wrong bathtub and be able to call Amazon and have them chirp "no problem, we'll come pick it up!" I had to pay delivery since it was my mistake, but customer service was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: A tub for normal size adults.
customer_reviews.text: Holy hell! This thing is a monster! Most tubs are standard 5' long (60" inch), but this guy is 72", and 36" wide! If I could, I would remodel my bathroom just for this tub... but can't afford either the tub, or a complete remodel at the moment, unfortunately. Our current tub is a 5'x32"x14"... pretty small for our needs. I would so love to have something like this....
customer_reviews.author: ZoltanHUN

product_meta.title: American Standard 7236V002.020 Evolution 6 Ft. X 36 In. Deep Soaking Tub with Reversible Drain, White
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteDesigned to soothe at the end of the day, the evolution deep soaking tub from American Standard is a luxurious 18 ½ in. Deep bathing pool that allows for total immersion and comfort. Featuring dual molded-in armrests, lumbar support and a safe, slip-resistant floor surface, evolution transforms everyday bathing into a relaxing spa experience.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Evolution tub is crafted in acrylic with fiberglass reinforcement, and has dual molded-in armrests, a pre-leveled tub bottom and an undermount installation option. Shown in white; Order deep soak max drain separately. At American Standard, it all begins with our unmatched legacy of quality and innovation that has lasted for more than 130 years. It is this tradition of quality and innovation that puts us in three out of five homes in America, as well as, countless hotels, airports, and stadiums. We provide the style and performance that fit perfectly into life, wherever that may be.
feature_bullets: Deep and roomy for total body immersion and comfort
Requires deep-soak max drain 1599.205, sold separately
Durable brass deep-soak max drain, required, is a top-mount overflow allowing a 3" deeper water level than standard bath drains
Made of glossy acrylic with durable fiberglass reinforcement
Full coverage 18 ½ inch depth to overflow
Comfortable, wide contoured lumbar support and molded armrests

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars40 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
